text:
If ant can make a build version for the output ear/jar/war files what it 
creates then it would be greatful.    Say for example, the ant may read a 
version.xml and read a attribute to add a new version to the output jar/ear/war 
file when the build succeeds.
creator: ananthk@tarangtech.com
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
This is all possible using a combination of existing Ant tasks.  The ones to 
note are: <xmlproperty>, <propertyfile>, <copy filtering="true">, 
<buildnumber>, and several other possibilities.  I'm going to mark this as 
WONTFIX as its already something possible.
